content:

thought: To craft a crimson_stair, I first need to craft two crimson_planks. This requires placing a stripped_crimson_stem in the crafting table. I will therefore move the stripped_crimson_stem from slot 32 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
